shadow.name: DEAFNESS
shadow.description: The shadow frequency of Breakthrough, expressing through deafness

gift.name: INSIGHT
gift.description: The gift frequency of Breakthrough, expressing through insight

siddhi.name: EPIPHANY
siddhi.description: The siddhi frequency of Breakthrough, expressing through epiphany

inversion_protocols.script: This is Gate 43 shadow frequency. The deafness you're experiencing is a distortion of your natural insight. Through awareness and experimentation, you can shift from deafness to insight.
inversion_protocols.somatic_anchor: Feel into your ajna. Notice the sensation of deafness.

experiment.hypothesis: If I work with Gate 43 consciously for 7 days, the deafness pattern will shift toward insight.
experiment.action: Daily practice working with Gate 43 energy.

success_criteria.target: Noticeable shift from deafness toward insight
